creditline: Gift of Robert and Gloria Congdon
description: Funeral pillow, polyester, layered border, fold and tuck applique in pink, black, green and yellow. Yellow squares represent vegetable blossoms. Daughters and daughters-in-law make funeral pillows for their parents. Pillows to be placed under the head when parent is buried.

title: Funeral Pillow Cover
